name: Panoply Modification
effect: Gain the Poke The Beast Protocol which you can use to change the first damage type of the weapon this mod is applied to
description:
“Honestly? I just thought it would be a fun joke. Hey babe, design me a way to make my guns shoot, lead, lasers and fire. Never thought anything would come of it. Turns out, Al really likes challenging projects. Works fucking *great* when things have special armors and such.”  -Jak Ashe on the origins of the panoply mod system.

A modification designed to allow a weapon to change the type of projectile or striking surface it has on a moment to moment basis, this entity and its housing are based on code and maths usually found in the mimic gun, with all the paracausality that implies. Able to be “poked” in a similar way, the playfully mercurial personality can randomly shift between a set number of possible outcomes, from lasers, to solid kinetics, to super-heated plasma arcs, somehow.

actions.name: Poke The Beast
actions.detail:
Roll 1d6 to determine the weapon's new damage type
1- Kinetic
2- Energy
3- Explosive
4- Halve damage and change type to Heat
5- Quarter damage and change type to Burn
6- Choose (Kinetic, Energy, Explosive)

name: Ricochet Munition
effect: Allows you to fire at terrain, structures, and deployables, changing the direction for the remaining range once, and granting +1 range to the shot, as if the origin point for it is the object it was aimed at.

name: Fortification Modification
effect:
Allows for the equipped weapon to be deployed as a fortification with the following stats depending on its size:
Auxiliary- size 1/2, 5 hp, 10 evasion
Main- size 1/2, 5 hp, 5 evasion, 1 armour
Heavy- size 1, 10 hp, 5 evasion
Superheavy- size 1, 10 hp, 5 evasion, 1 armour
description: "By replacing the entire mount with stabilizers, firing solutions, and reinforcements we can deploy it as a semi permanent fortification, perfect for long term defenses during rebuilding and settlement efforts"

deployables.name: Superheavy Fortification
deployables.detail:
Deploy Superheavy Weapon as Fortification
Can be recalled from adjacent or shared spaces

deployables.name: Main Fortification
deployables.detail:
Deploy Main Weapon as Fortification
Can be recalled from adjacent or shared spaces

name: BLUE DEVILS TRACER ROUNDS

description: [...] A tried and true bit of tech dating back to ancient times. Targeting systems do most of the work nowadays, but the blue is a nice touch. [...]
